categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Reamma was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, the Alliance to Restore the Republic set up a temporary base, LX-Robynsun V, on Reamma. The Resistance used LX-Robynsun V as a base during the Cold War between the First Order and the Resistance.
